title: Teetering Digital Dollar USDD Falls Further From Its $1 Target Amidst Major Market Uncertainty
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Troubled stablecoin USDD is sliding further away from its targeted $1 peg Wednesday morning amidst further crypto turmoil that is seeing bitcoin threaten to fall below $20,000.

title: Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, DeFi Tokens Fall - Bitcoin Holds Key Support Ahead Of Options Expiry
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Ethereum and its competitors dropped Thursday as investors continued to shed perceived risker digital assets. Bitcoin is holding stay above a key support level.

title: Innovative Crypto Stablecoins- Still At Infancy And Experiencing Growing Pains
author: Roomy Khan
description: Recent monetary policy tightening have triggered steep declines in many financial markets, including crypto assets which have lost almost $1 trillion in market capitalization in just one week.

title: Bitcoin Gold Leads Crypto Market Recovery With 40% Gain
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Smaller cryptocurrencies surged Monday as bitcoin saw a relief rally, tracking signs of risk reset in traditional markets. But none did better than Bitcoin Gold.
